00038 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00039 {
00040     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00041     const char* stopdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_STOPWORD_DICT;
00042 
00043     for(int optIndex=1; optIndex+1<argc; optIndex+=2)
00044     {
00045         if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--stop"))
00046             stopdict = argv[optIndex+1];
00047         else if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--dict"))
00048             sysdict = argv[optIndex+1];
00049         else
00050         {
00051             cerr << "unknown option: " << argv[optIndex] << endl;
00052             printUsage();
00053             exit(1);
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00057     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00058     cout << "stop word dictionary: " << stopdict << endl;
00059 
00060     // create factory
00061     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00062 
00063     // create analyzer and knowledge
00064     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00065     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00066 
00067     // load dictioanry files
00068     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00069     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00070     {
00071         cerr << "error: fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00072         exit(1);
00073     }
00074     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00075 
00076     // load stop word dictionary
00077     if(knowledge->loadStopWordDict(stopdict) == 0)
00078     {
00079         cerr << "error: fail to load stop word dictionary" << endl;
00080         exit(1);
00081     }
00082 
00083     // set knowledge
00084     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00085     {
00086         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00087         exit(1);
00088     }
00089 
00090     Sentence s;
00091     string line;
00092     while(getline(cin, line))
00093     {
00094         s.setString(line.c_str());
00095 
00096         if(analyzer->runWithSentence(s) != 1)
00097         {
00098             cerr << "error: fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00099             exit(1);
00100         }
00101 
00102         // get one-best result
00103         int i= s.getOneBestIndex();
00104         if(i == -1)
00105             cout << "no one-best result exists." << endl;
00106         else
00107         {
00108             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00109                 cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00110 
00111             cout << endl;
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     delete knowledge;
00116     delete analyzer;

00118     return 0;
